LanguageData.BuildXM307ACSW_Crate.label: Build XM-307 Advanced Crew Served Weapon crate
LanguageData.BuildXM307ACSW_Crate.description: Use this to build a XM-307 ACSW, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 25x59mm grenades for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildXM307ACSW_Crate.jobString: Build XM-307 Advanced Crew Served Weapon crate.
